segments.text: Excuse me , this is my first time on a plane . How do I check in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your ticket , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can get a boarding pass at that counter . Do you have anything to check in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I only have a handbag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you could wait in the departure area after going through security .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I think so . It is very simple .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
